content.raw:
I've updated the jenkins scripts to use the rendering2 nightly in the following PR:

* https://bitbucket.org/osrf/release-tools/pull-requests/800/use-blueprint-nightlies-of-rendering2/diff

testing here

* [ign-gui pr 198](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gui/pull-requests/198/bump-default-to-200/diff) [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ignition_gui-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64&build=149)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_gui-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64/149/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_gui-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64/149/
